text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' alnas: 'iin kuntum fi shakin min sihat diniin aldhy daeawtukum 'ilyh, wahu al'islam wamin thbaty wastqamty elyh, watarjun thwyly enh, fa'iiniy la 'aebud fi hal min al'ahwal ahdana min aladhin tebdwnhm mimaa atakhadhtum min al'asnam walawthan, wlkn 'aebud allah wahdah aldhy yumitukum wyqbd arwahkm, w'umirt 'an 'akun min almsddiqyn bih aleamilin bshreh
